player.cpp:73:42: error: ‘my_pip’ was not declared in this scope
         int min_cost = raise_bounds[0] - my_pip;  // the cost of a minimum bet/raise
                                          ^~~~~~

         int min_cost = raise_bounds[0] - my_pip;  // the cost of a minimum bet/raise
